sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { assets } from '../../assets/assets' import './food.css' import { StoreContext } from '../../context/StoreContext' const Food_Item = ({id,name,price,description,image}) => { const [itemCount,setItemCount]=useState(0) const {cartItems,addToCart,removeFromCart}=useContext(StoreContext) return (
{ !itemCount?setItemCount(prev=>prev+1)} src={assets.add_icon_white} alt=""/>:
setItemCount(prev=>prev-1)} src={assets.remove_icon_red} alt=""/>

{itemCount}

setItemCount(prev=>prev+1)} src={assets.add_icon_green} alt="" />
}

{name}

{description}

${ price}

) } export default Food_Item
